body: Consider for example some hourly average monitoring data from 8 am of a particular day to 18 pm of another day. I have to use the LB analysis period considering this range: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/aSMPMUi84JTsNaARDr*peVxAmZNeTuaO6dREYu6olxbrRvsgdhLd7Sy2WKv0MuZzgP9NFNRnOy5ldg2TZB2gX8hBtcsF3hrl/Cattura.JPG) It happens that all hourly data out of the range 8 am - 18 pm are cutted off: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/aSMPMUi84JTXaJMz16H0T1uHL0QNY*EEky5tby5SFW-WLksgKxR24C*oEX5P*03XQ*8h-B9Ar*j1xYWpERO1MXQL0Hh9nrTx/Cattura1.JPG) It could be useful to add an option that allow to consider all hourly data in the established range. I added a post also in [github](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/408).
